content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position (10.5, 10.5)
Consists of steam engine (position 10.5, 10.5), boiler (position -6.0, 24.5), and offshore pump (position -9.5, 24.5)

### Iron ore mine at position (43.0, -84.0)
Consists of burner mining drill (position 43.0, -84.0) and a furnace at position (42.0, -81.0)

### Iron plate factory at position (45.0, -83.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace at position (45.0, -83.0)
-  Furnace at position (40.0, -82.0)
-  Furnace at position (42.0, -81.0)

### Copper cable factory
No entities found

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when extracting items
-  Make sure the entity you are trying to extract from contains the item you want to extract
-  Ensure the entity you are trying to extract from is a valid container for the item

### Errors when placing entities
-  Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it
-  Check for collisions with existing entities or water in the area
-  Consider increasing the spacing, changing the direction, or changing the reference position

### Errors when placing entities too far away
-  Move closer to the target position before attempting to place the entity
-  Ensure the target position is within the maximum allowed distance from the player position

### Errors when placing entities with existing objects in the way
-  Check for existing objects in the target location and remove or move them before attempting to place the entity
-  Consider changing the target location to avoid collisions with existing objects
